name: thunderbolt
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A strong electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: A strong electrical attack that may paralyze the foe.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A strong electrical attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.
